message: It does, not by default but there are plenty of admin gems available. I think active-scaffold was one of the more popular ones... I can't remember most of them though.
webapp-theme is a good gem to help build an admin theme, and is very customizable
good question. For the most part if you want to build a real web application you should be building a custom admin module anyways
but yeah I dont know why rails doesnt have an admin module, seems like it would be useful
I believe there's a lot of work going into: https://github.com/sferik/rails_admin
admin_assistant is another great gem that makes great admin modules and is very customizable.
